member.name: T:Nadam.Global.JsonDb.DeferredExecutionPlans
member.summary: Entitiy Frameworks load strategies for queryable

member.name: F:Nadam.Global.JsonDb.DeferredExecutionPlans.LazyLoading
member.summary: Lazy loading is the process whereby an entity or collection of entities is automatically loaded from the database the first time that a property referring to the entity/entities is accessed. (There is no .Include() method)

member.name: F:Nadam.Global.JsonDb.DeferredExecutionPlans.EagerLoading
member.summary: It loads only the selected table, and not and dependet entity (foreign key) so virtual properties will remain null Eager loading is the process whereby a query for one type of entity also loads related entities as part of the query. Eager loading is achieved by use of the Include method.

member.name: M:Nadam.Global.JsonDb.DatabaseGraph.RelationalDatabaseGraph.AddTable(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Add new table to the graph, and need to define if any other table in graph is depends on this new one and make the directed edges according to that

member.name: T:Nadam.Global.JsonDb.JsonDbEngineContext
member.summary: Json file based data storage with a context class to access these files. CRUD operations are supported
